instruction_en: Determine the sentiment of the provided movie review. Reflect on the overall tone and language used in {variable_1} to classify whether the sentiment of the review is positive or negative. Consider indicators such as the choice of words, phrases that imply enjoyment or disappointment, and the general enthusiasm or lack thereof in the text. Provide your analysis based on these observations.
instruction_yo: Ṣe ipinnu imọlara ti atunyẹwo fiimu ti a pese. Ronu lori ohun orin gbogbogbo ati ede ti a lo ni {variable_1} lati ṣe iyatọ boya ero inu atunyẹwo jẹ rere tabi odi. Wo awọn itọkasi gẹgẹbi yiyan awọn ọrọ, awọn gbolohun ọrọ ti o tumọ igbadun tabi ibanujẹ, ati itara gbogbogbo tabi aini rẹ ninu ọrọ naa. Pese itupalẹ rẹ ti o da lori awọn akiyesi wọnyi.
input_en: {variable_1}: 'I couldn't wait for it to end. The plot was all over the place, and the characters lacked depth. Overall, a very disappointing experience.'
input_yo: {variable_1}: 'Nko le duro de opin. Idite naa wa ni gbogbo ibi, ati awọn ohun kikọ ko ni ijinle. Lapapọ, iriri itaniloju pupọ.'
output_en: The sentiment of the review is negative.
